content.text: Trial 3/5, Stage 'corner2': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows an angular groove part with a prominent corner marked by a red circle. The groove consists of two straight sections forming an L-shape, with one segment extending horizontally and the other vertically.

### Stiffness Matrix

```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
